column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Because you are the more experienced player .
#Text=Yeah !
#Text=And now you have another silver medal .
#Text=Yes .
#Text=Which is great .
#Text=We double-checked , and there was nobody else on the team who had been in Sydney , much less Barcelona or Atlanta .
#Text=I know .
#Text=Most of the Gliders seem to have come together in 2004 , the current roster .
#Text=Yes , most since 2004 , and some since 2008 .
#Text=And of course there are three newbies for 2012 .
#Text=Are you still playing ?
#Text=I 'm having a rest at this particular point .
#Text=Probably because it 's been a long campaign of the training over the four years .
#Text=I guess more intense over the last eighteen months or so .
#Text=At the moment I am having a short break just to spend some time with my son .
#Text=Those sorts of things .
#Text=‘ Cause he stayed at home rather than come to London .
#Text=You would have been isolated from him anyway .
#Text=And that 's the thing .

#Text=We just decided that if he had come , it would have been harder for him , knowing he 'd have five minutes a day or twenty minutes or something like that where he could see me versus he spoke to me for an hour on Skype every day .
#Text=So , I think it would have been harder to say to Alex : " Look , you ca n't come back to the village .
#Text=And that 's probably the biggest change from a public perspective .
